headline: Pennsylvania Senate race candidates visit state farm show complex
sentences: The candidates listened to agricultural concerns and also used the time to campaign for the seat being vacated by Republican Sen. Pat Toomey.

HARRISBURG, Pa. â€”
The Pennsylvania Agriculture Luncheon was held on Saturday at the state farm show complex in Harrisburg.
The event brought in the state's Senate seat race candidates including United States Lt. Gov.
John Fetterman, United States Congressman Conor Lamb and state Rep. Malcolm Kenyatta.
